statements: SELECT * FROM advertising_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, company_name, budget FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT company_name, target_audience FROM advertising_campaigns ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY budget ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, company_name FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 AND end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc' ORDER BY target_audience DESC;
SELECT * FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE budget BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, SUM(budget) AS total_budget FROM advertising_campaigns GROUP BY company_name HAVING SUM(budget) > 20000;
SELECT * FROM AdCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, spend FROM AdCampaigns WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT campaign_name, clicks, conversions FROM AdCampaigns WHERE spend >= 500.00;
SELECT id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM AdCampaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, spend, clicks, conversions FROM AdCampaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY spend ASC, clicks DESC;
SELECT * FROM AdCampaigns WHERE clicks > 100 AND conversions > 20;
SELECT campaign_name, spend FROM AdCampaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM AdCampaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, clicks, cost FROM AdCampaigns INNER JOIN PerformanceMetrics ON AdCampaigns.id = PerformanceMetrics.ad_campaign_id WHERE PerformanceMetrics.date = '2022-08-01';
SELECT campaign_name, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions FROM AdCampaigns GROUP BY campaign_name HAVING total_clicks > 500 AND total_conversions > 50;
SELECT * FROM advertising_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, budget, status FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT company_name, industry FROM company ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE budget >= 1000.00 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT date, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM campaign_metrics WHERE campaign_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-556642440000';
SELECT * FROM advertising_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT campaign_name, status, budget FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM company WHERE headquarters_location = 'New York';
SELECT campaign_id, date, impressions, revenue FROM campaign_metrics ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM AdvertisingCampaign;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM AdvertisingCampaign WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget FROM AdvertisingCampaign ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT AVG(budget) AS avg_budget FROM AdvertisingCampaign;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM AdvertisingCampaign WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Conversions WHERE conversion_count > 5 ORDER BY conversion_value DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM AdvertisingCampaign WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(conversion_count) AS total_conversions FROM Conversions GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_conversions > 10;
SELECT * FROM Impressions JOIN Clicks ON Impressions.impression_id = Clicks.impression_id WHERE Clicks.click_count > 3;
SELECT AVG(click_count) AS avg_click_count, MAX(click_count) AS max_click_count, MIN(click_count) AS min_click_count FROM Clicks;
SELECT * FROM AdvertisingCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM AdvertisingCampaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT user_id, product_id, location FROM ImpressionData ORDER BY impression_time DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_id, click_time, device FROM ClickData WHERE device = 'mobile' AND product_id = 12345;
SELECT user_id, product_id, revenue FROM ConversionData WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY revenue ASC;
SELECT * FROM AdvertisingCampaigns WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY start_date DESC, budget ASC LIMIT 10

SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM AdvertisingCampaigns JOIN ClickData ON AdvertisingCampaigns.id = ClickData.campaign_id WHERE ClickData.product_id = 12345 AND ClickData.device = 'mobile' ORDER BY start_date ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget, status FROM AdvertisingCampaigns JOIN ImpressionData ON AdvertisingCampaigns.id = ImpressionData.campaign_id JOIN ConversionData ON AdvertisingCampaigns.id = ConversionData.campaign_id WHERE ImpressionData.location = 'New York' AND ConversionData.revenue > 100 ORDER BY budget DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(DISTINCT UserFeedback.user_id) AS total_feedback_users FROM AdvertisingCampaigns JOIN UserFeedback ON AdvertisingCampaigns.id = UserFeedback.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name HAVING total_feedback_users >= 50 ORDER BY total_feedback_users DESC

SELECT campaign_name, SUM(ConversionData.revenue) AS total_revenue FROM AdvertisingCampaigns JOIN ConversionData ON AdvertisingCampaigns.id = ConversionData.campaign_id WHERE ConversionData.conversion_time > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY campaign_name HAVING total_revenue > 5000 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC
